document.full_text: alaa al aswany is not afraid to use his fame as a best-selling writer to back calls for political change. now he warns that the old guard could undermine the revolution.
document.title: middle east: fearless egyptian author both jubilant and cautious
lines_and_colors: alaa al aswany is not afraid to use his fame as a best-selling writer to back calls for political change. now he warns that the old guard could undermine the revolution.
